bibdata.title: ISO/IEC/IEEE International Standard
Systems and software engineering
Life cycle processes -- Project management -- Redline
ISO/IEC/IEEE International Standard - Systems and software engineering - Life cycle processes -- Project management -- Redline

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This document provides normative content specifications for project management plans concerned with systems, and software systems. This document also provides detailed discussion and advice on applying a set of technical management processes that are common to both the system and software life cycles as covered by ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288 and ISO/IEC/IEEE 12207 respectively. The discussion and advice are intended to aid in the preparation of the normative content of project management plans.

This document provides normative content specifications for project management plans concerned with systems, and software systems. This document also provides detailed discussion and advice on applying a set of technical management processes that are common to both the system and software life cycles as covered by ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288 and ISO/IEC/IEEE 12207 respectively. The discussion and advice are intended to aid in the preparation of the normative content of project management plans.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
